file_content.text: Bah. Go ahead and kill me. I didn't want to die at the hands of the beast anyway.
I seek Jedi Xerender. Tell me where he is and what he is searching for.
You will help me.
Xerender. He refused to let me come with him. Left me here to face death.
Why don't you explain to me what you're talking about.
What beast?
Relax.
If you'd seen what I've seen, you'd know how foolish that sounds.
The Talz warned my Master about Broonmark. He's a savage Talz seeking revenge on Fetzellen and the others for ousting him.
But did Xerender care? No! Now Broonmark's in here somewhere, murdering--wait! Did you hear that? No, he's... he's....
Die, Jedi!
My death is on Master Xerender's head....
All dead at our hands! Sith must leave now or join the dead!
You've outdone yourself, but heed your limitations.
Quit while you're ahead, Talz.
Sith comes from a powerful clan, we know.
I'm not afraid of you.
All creatures know fear.
You think killing a defenseless man makes you impressive?
That was a cowardly act.
We do not care. We seek blood! We seek vengeance!
Our clan is betrayed. Fetzellen now leads. Fetzellen and all who follow him must end.
We know Sith craves Jedi Xerender. Xerender is with Fetzellen. But Sith must not get in our way.
We should work together. We are of common purpose.
So we hunt the same group.
Sith purpose is war, politics, Jedi. All complicated. Our purpose is cleansing, revenge. Simple.
What are you going to do about it?
You trying to pick a fight?
Our method is clear. Our victims are everywhere.
I have no quarrel with Fetzellen and the Talz.
I'm only after Xerender.
They hunt with Xerender. They hunt for Xerender.
Our clan must be clean. We must have our vendetta. Do not block our hunt.
You would be wise to stay out of my way, Talz.
I will go wherever I wish.
Then we must beat respect from you!
I have no intention of disrupting you, Broonmark.
I won't interfere.
Sith are smart. We speak what we know.
The weapon Xerender craves is not a thing, it is another Jedi. His lost clan leader--Master Wyellett.
We waste too much time. Fetzellen and all Talz must die.
We'll see.
We take no chances. We beat respect out of all!
I'm all that's left. Everywhere I turn the... the monster appears. Why do you torment me? I'm not part of your vendetta!
What? A Sith? First Xerender abandons me, now this!
Your name, Jedi, and your connection to Xerender. Now.
Tell me who you are. Quickly.
I am Xerender's errand boy. The one he leaves behind to die.
What's going on?
I'll tell you what happened--I was left to die!
I mean you no harm.
Why should I trust you? You're my sworn enemy.
At least a Sith I can see and fight straight up. I won't be assassinated in the dark like these poor Talz....
My Master would tell me not to attack--but he's not here. Defend yourself, Sith!
